welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bonita Springs! Get ready to experience the charm of our beautiful city, known for its stunning beaches, outdoor activities, and vibrant cultural scene. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and enjoying all that Bonita Springs has to offer."
